remarks: A one-equation proof of linearity of a left module homomorphism, similar to ~ df-lss .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
islmhm2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
islmhm2.c $e |- C = ( Base ` T ) $.
islmhm2.k $e |- K = ( Scalar ` S ) $.
islmhm2.l $e |- L = ( Scalar ` T ) $.
islmhm2.e $e |- E = ( Base ` K ) $.
islmhm2.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
islmhm2.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
islmhm2.m $e |- .x. = ( .s ` S ) $.
islmhm2.n $e |- .X. = ( .s ` T ) $.
islmhm2 $p |- ( ( S e. LMod /\ T e. LMod ) -> ( F e. ( S LMHom T ) <-> ( F : B --> C /\ L = K /\ A. x e. E A. y e. B A. z e. B ( F ` ( ( x .x. y ) .+ z ) ) = ( ( x .X. ( F ` y ) ) .+^ ( F ` z ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .+^ x y z $.
$d .X. x z $.
$d .x. x z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d E x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d L x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
